2 legs - 2 feet - head - wattle - beak - 2 eyes - 2 pupils - comb - 2 wings - the chicken s botty  - 3 tail feathers note - for the chicken components eh giblets do not join at the end of round unless otherwise stated - all parts will be worked with single_crochet only legs note you decide how long you like the legs to be aka how many rds you will work in orange ch2 round 1 4 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook =4sts round 2 2 single_crochet in each st around =8sts round 3 1 single_crochet in flo of each st around =8sts round 4 until end repeat round 3 until desired leg length is reached join your last row with slip_stitch =8sts last row ch1 and fold leg so that the 8 sts of the previous round are lying 4/4 then just stitch in 2 sts at a time treating them as 1 st but st in back loop of the frontmost st and in front loop of the rearward st this will make a row of 4sc out of the 8sc-round =4sts fasten_off leaving a long tail for sewing work another leg in the same manner then sew the legs to the earflaps ©2017 anja welling find wilma spielen on facebook wordpress and ravelry 6 wilmaspielen wordpress com -
